TopicTitle: Why is my KerbinSide not working?

Articles.Content: Ok so i downloaded for 1.0.5 the All in one kerbin side pack *that does have kerbalkonstucts in it* and i took ever thing in the gamedata folder and i copied it and put it in the game data for my KSP.Now im running KSp kerbin side works fine but i want to know why when im on the ground in a plane and i click the BaseKKBoss icon and it shows everything but when im in the air and when i click the BaseKKBoss icon it shows a big empty rectangle...Is there anyway to fix this or is it a bug the the creator of the mod is working on.
It still isn't really worked out for 1.0.5 yet. They still need to squash some bugs.
